segments.text: I need to get some beef .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know what kind of beef you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to get some ground beef .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many pounds do you need ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like four pounds of ground beef .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of ground beef do you need ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like the extra lean .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me go and get that for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . I'll wrap it up for you now .
segments.speaker: S2
